Room.Name: Hillcrest Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Hillcrest Drive, a long road connecting the two sides of the city.
Room.LongDescription: To the south of Hillcrest Drive resides the Walk of Heroes monument, which is primarily just a lush, green park with numerous bronze and marble statues of heroes past and present. There is a large building on the north side of Hillcrest which seems to glow with a magical aura. Unfortunately, there's nothing much to distinguish it from this point of view.
